description:
Captain of the American battleship http://anidb.net/ch118258 [Abraham]. Him and his ship are on a hunt for a supposed sea monster that`s been reported to be sinking ships in the Pacific Ocean.
Later in the series, he becomes a minor antagonist to the main cast once http://anidb.net/ch54793 [Gargoyle] tells the American Navy that the http://anidb.net/ch54795 [Nautilus] is responsible for sinking the ships.

name: Meville-kanchou
